Description of incident: The Outback Steakhouse in Northridge, a franchise location for the restaurant group T-Bird Restaurant Group, Inc. notified employees of a data breach when the location was burglarized. The individual (s) managed to steal computer equipment including their point of sale computer terminal and back office computer. The point of sale computer contained information that included employee time sheet information, files that contained names and Social Security numbers. The company is offering ID Experts theft protection for one year for free. Those affected call 1-888-773-9953 or go to www.IDExpertscorp.com/protect.More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-57861
